001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
005import org.openqa.selenium.By;
006
007import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
008
009/**
010 * Provides an interface for interacting with loader elements in a UI automation framework,
011 * enabling checks for visibility and waiting mechanisms for when loaders appear or disappear.
012 * By referencing a {@link LoaderComponentType} and the {@link #DEFAULT_TYPE}, implementations
013 * integrate seamlessly with broader test automation pipelines.
014 *
015 * <p>Classes implementing this interface typically rely on Selenium-based operations for
016 * synchronization, ensuring loaders are properly shown or removed within expected timeframes.
017 *
018 * <p>All methods are designed to support both container-based and locator-based identification
019 * of loader elements, offering a flexible approach to handle various UI designs.
020 *
021 * <p>Methods in this interface throw runtime exceptions if loaders do not appear or disappear
022 * within the specified time, allowing test flows to handle unexpected loading behavior.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026public interface LoaderService {
027
028   LoaderComponentType DEFAULT_TYPE = getDefaultType();
029
030   /**
031    * Retrieves the default loader component type from the configuration.
032    *
033    * @return The default LoaderComponentType.
034    */
035   private static LoaderComponentType getDefaultType() {
036      try {
037         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(LoaderComponentType.class,
038               getUiConfig().loaderDefaultType(),
039               getUiConfig().projectPackages());
040      } catch (Exception ignored) {
041         return null;
042      }
043   }
044
045   /**
046    * Checks if a loader is visible within the specified container using the default loader component type.
047    *
048    * @param container The SmartWebElement container to check for the presence of the loader.
049    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
050    */
051   default boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container) {
052      return isVisible(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Checks if a loader is visible within the specified container using the given loader component type.
057    *
058    * @param componentType The specific loader component type.
059    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container to check for the presence of the loader.
060    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
061    */
062   boolean isVisible(LoaderComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
063
064   /**
065    * Checks if a loader is visible using the specified locator and the default loader component type.
066    *
067    * @param loaderLocator The By locator to check for the presence of the loader.
068    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
069    */
070   default boolean isVisible(By loaderLocator) {
071      return isVisible(DEFAULT_TYPE, loaderLocator);
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Checks if a loader is visible using the specified locator and loader component type.
076    *
077    * @param componentType The specific loader component type.
078    * @param loaderLocator The By locator to check for the presence of the loader.
079    * @return true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.
080    */
081   boolean isVisible(LoaderComponentType componentType, By loaderLocator);
082
083   /**
084    * Waits for the loader to be shown within the specified container for the given duration, using the default loader
085    * component type.
086    *
087    * @param container    The SmartWebElement container where the loader is expected to appear.
088    * @param secondsShown The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
089    */
090   default void waitToBeShown(SmartWebElement container, int secondsShown) {
091      waitToBeShown(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, secondsShown);
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Waits for the loader to be shown within the specified container for the given duration, using the given loader
096    * component type.
097    *
098    * @param componentType The specific loader component type.
099    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container where the loader is expected to appear.
100    * @param secondsShown  The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
101    */
102   void waitToBeShown(LoaderComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, int secondsShown);
103
104   /**
105    * Waits for the loader to be shown for the given duration, using the default loader component type.
106    *
107    * @param secondsShown The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
108    */
109   default void waitToBeShown(int secondsShown) {
110      waitToBeShown(DEFAULT_TYPE, secondsShown);
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Waits for the loader to be shown for the given duration, using the given loader component type.
115    *
116    * @param componentType The specific loader component type.
117    * @param secondsShown  The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
118    */
119   void waitToBeShown(LoaderComponentType componentType, int secondsShown);
120
121   /**
122    * Waits for the loader to be shown using the specified locator for the given duration, using the default loader
123    * component type.
124    *
125    * @param loaderLocator The By locator for the loader element.
126    * @param secondsShown  The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
127    */
128   default void waitToBeShown(By loaderLocator, int secondsShown) {
129      waitToBeShown(DEFAULT_TYPE, loaderLocator, secondsShown);
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * Waits for the loader to be shown using the specified locator for the given duration, using the given loader
134    * component type.
135    *
136    * @param componentType The specific loader component type.
137    * @param loaderLocator The By locator for the loader element.
138    * @param secondsShown  The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
139    */
140   void waitToBeShown(LoaderComponentType componentType, By loaderLocator, int secondsShown);
141
142   /**
143    * Waits for the loader to be removed from the specified container within the given duration, using the default
144    * loader component type.
145    *
146    * @param container      The SmartWebElement container where the loader is expected to be removed.
147    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
148    */
149   default void waitToBeRemoved(SmartWebElement container, int secondsRemoved) {
150      waitToBeRemoved(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, secondsRemoved);
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Waits for the loader to be removed from the specified container within the given duration, using the given
155    * loader component type.
156    *
157    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
158    * @param container      The SmartWebElement container where the loader is expected to be removed.
159    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
160    */
161   void waitToBeRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, int secondsRemoved);
162
163   /**
164    * Waits for the loader to be removed within the given duration, using the default loader component type.
165    *
166    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
167    */
168   default void waitToBeRemoved(int secondsRemoved) {
169      waitToBeRemoved(DEFAULT_TYPE, secondsRemoved);
170   }
171
172   /**
173    * Waits for the loader to be removed within the given duration, using the given loader component type.
174    *
175    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
176    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
177    */
178   void waitToBeRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, int secondsRemoved);
179
180   /**
181    * Waits for the loader to be removed using the specified locator within the given duration, using the default
182    * loader component type.
183    *
184    * @param loaderLocator  The By locator for the loader element.
185    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
186    */
187   default void waitToBeRemoved(By loaderLocator, int secondsRemoved) {
188      waitToBeRemoved(DEFAULT_TYPE, loaderLocator, secondsRemoved);
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Waits for the loader to be removed using the specified locator within the given duration, using the given
193    * loader component type.
194    *
195    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
196    * @param loaderLocator  The By locator for the loader element.
197    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
198    */
199   void waitToBeRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, By loaderLocator, int secondsRemoved);
200
201   /**
202    * Waits for the loader to be shown and then removed from the specified container within the given durations.
203    *
204    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
205    * @param container      The SmartWebElement container.
206    * @param secondsShown   The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
207    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
208    */
209   default void waitToBeShownAndRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container,
210                                        int secondsShown, int secondsRemoved) {
211      waitToBeShown(componentType, container, secondsShown);
212      waitToBeRemoved(componentType, container, secondsRemoved);
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Waits for the loader to be shown and then removed within the given durations, using the given loader component
217    * type.
218    *
219    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
220    * @param secondsShown   The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
221    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
222    */
223   default void waitToBeShownAndRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, int secondsShown, int secondsRemoved) {
224      waitToBeShown(componentType, secondsShown);
225      waitToBeRemoved(componentType, secondsRemoved);
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Waits for the loader to be shown and then removed using the specified locator within the given durations, using
230    * the given loader component type.
231    *
232    * @param componentType  The specific loader component type.
233    * @param loaderLocator  The By locator for the loader element.
234    * @param secondsShown   The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
235    * @param secondsRemoved The maximum time to wait for the loader to be removed, in seconds.
236    */
237   default void waitToBeShownAndRemoved(LoaderComponentType componentType, By loaderLocator, int secondsShown,
238                                        int secondsRemoved) {
239      waitToBeShown(componentType, loaderLocator, secondsShown);
240      waitToBeRemoved(componentType, loaderLocator, secondsRemoved);
241   }
242}
